    public class SettingsFragment
extends android.support.v7.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat
implements android.support.v7.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener
    A simple Fragment subclass. It manages the preference screen / settings activity.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        o - changed object
        Returns:
